title: Tel Aviv Museum of Art - Free for Under 18
location: Tel Aviv Museum of Art, 27 Shaul HaMelech Blvd
description: Free admission for children under 18, soldiers, and national service volunteers. Open Mon/Wed/Sat 10am-6pm, Tue/Thu 10am-9pm, Fri 10am-2pm.

title: Israel Museum - Free Saturday Mornings
description: The Israel Museum offers discounted or free admission on Saturday mornings. One of the world's leading museums with archaeology, art, and Judaica collections.

title: Israel Museum - Free Activities for Children
description: Free children's activities at the Israel Museum Youth Wing. Art workshops and interactive exhibits for kids.

title: Yad Vashem Holocaust Museum - Free Admission
description: Israel's official Holocaust memorial museum. Free admission (small registration fee may apply for online reservations).

title: Reuben and Edith Hecht Museum - Free Entry
description: Free admission and free guided tours (book in advance). Collections include archaeology, art, and maritime history.

title: Genia Schreiber University Art Gallery - Free
description: Free university art gallery focusing on modern art and Israeli artists. Rotating exhibitions throughout the year.

title: Rothschild Boulevard Art Galleries - Free Entry
description: Free entry to contemporary art galleries along Rothschild Boulevard. Gordon Gallery, Stern Gallery, Alon Segev Gallery and more.

title: Free Yoga in Yarkon Park
description: Free community yoga classes in Yarkon Park. Bring your own mat. Winter: 11am-2pm, Summer: 7am or evening. Check park notice boards for exact times.

title: Free Yoga on Tel Aviv Beaches
description: Free yoga events on Tel Aviv beaches. Check Eventbrite Tel Aviv for specific dates and times.

title: Israel Free Walking Tour - Tel Aviv
description: Free 2-hour walking tours through Kerem Ha'temanim (Yemenite Quarter), Neve Tzedek, and more. Tips-based model. Highly rated on TripAdvisor.

title: Abraham Tours - Free Jaffa Walking Tour
description: Free walking tour of ancient Jaffa port city. Visit Jaffa Clock Tower, the port, St. Peter's Church, Simon the Tanner's House.

title: SANDEMANs Free Walking Tour - Tel Aviv
description: Free guided walking tour by SANDEMANs NEW Europe Tours. Tips-based, professional local guides.

title: Abraham Tours - Free Jerusalem Old City Tour
description: Free walking tour exploring the four Old City quarters, Tower of David, and Church of the Holy Sepulchre.

title: SANDEMANs Free Walking Tour - Jerusalem
description: Free Jerusalem walking tour with professional guides. Tips-based model.

title: GuruWalk Free Tours - Haifa
description: Free walking tours in Haifa with local guides. Pay-what-you-wish model based on your enjoyment.

title: Western Wall (Kotel) - Free 24/7
location: Western Wall Plaza, Old City, Jerusalem
description: The most visited free tourist spot in Israel. The Western Wall is free and open 24/7.

title: Church of the Holy Sepulchre - Free Entry
description: One of the holiest churches in the world. Entry is free of charge.

title: Teddy Park Water Show - Free
location: Teddy Park, near Old City Walls, Jerusalem
description: Free 30-minute water fountain show every hour or two. Getting wet is free and open to the public!

title: Haas-Sherover-Goldman Promenades - Free
description: Three extensive walking paths with spectacular views of Jerusalem and beyond. Free access.

title: Carmel Market (Shuk HaCarmel) - Free Entry
description: Tel Aviv's biggest and busiest marketplace. Colorful stalls selling dried fruits, spices, clothing, and more. Free entry, artists market on Tue/Fri.

title: Sarona Market - Free Entry
description: Israel's largest indoor culinary market. Free entry to browse gourmet food stalls, restaurants, and shops.

title: Stella Maris Monastery - Free Entry
location: Stella Maris Road, Mt. Carmel, Haifa
description: 19th century monastery with beautiful stained-glass windows, colorful ceiling, and the cave of Prophet Elijah. Free and open daily.

title: Haifa Beaches - Free Access
location: Dado Beach / Bat Galim Beach, Haifa
description: Free beach access at Bat Galim, Dado Beach, and Hof Hasheket. Popular spots for swimming, relaxing, and free beach yoga.

title: Beit Avi Chai - Free Events & Lectures
description: Free lectures, exhibitions, and cultural events on Jewish-Israeli philosophy, art, history. Free parking for attendees.

title: TEDxTelAvivUniversity
description: TEDx conference at Tel Aviv University - first TEDx with full orchestra. Free/low-cost tickets available.

title: TEDxWhiteCity
location: Israeli Opera, Tel Aviv Performing Arts Center
description: TEDx event at the Israeli Opera featuring inspiring talks on innovation and ideas.

title: Tel Aviv Tayelet (Promenade) - Free
description: Iconic seaside promenade stretching from Tel Aviv to Jaffa. Free walking, biking, and stunning Mediterranean views.

title: Yarkon Park - Free Entry & Activities
description: Tel Aviv's largest park with free playgrounds, gardens, running/biking paths, basketball courts, and picnic areas.

title: Purim Events 2026 - Free Street Celebrations
description: Purim 2026 takes place March 2-4. Free street parties and celebrations throughout Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Haifa, and Eilat.

title: Adloyada Holon - Purim Parade
description: Israel's biggest Purim parade! Free carnival celebration perfect for families and kids. Costumes, floats, and festivities.

title: Free Passover Museums & Sites
description: Every Passover, Bank Hapoalim sponsors free entrance to over 40 museums, national parks, and heritage sites across Israel.

title: Shavuot Night Learning - Jerusalem
description: Free all-night learning sessions and lectures across Jerusalem for Shavuot. Open to all.

title: Light Up Tel Aviv - Hanukkah Festival
description: Free Hanukkah celebration with face painting, sufganiyot (donuts), music, and public candle lighting for families.

title: Red Canyon Hike - Free Entry
description: Beautiful free hiking trail in the Eilat Mountains. Green trail is family-friendly, black trail more challenging.

title: Israel National Trail - Free Hiking
description: Over 1,000km of marked hiking trails from north to south. Free access to all sections of the Israel National Trail.

title: Bahai Gardens Viewpoint - Free
description: Free panoramic views of the stunning Bahai Gardens terraces from the upper viewpoint. One of Israel's most photographed sites.

title: Neve Tzedek Walking Tour - Free
description: Free self-guided walking tour through Tel Aviv's charming historic neighborhood. Beautiful Bauhaus architecture and boutiques.

title: Nachalat Binyamin Arts & Crafts Fair
description: Free outdoor arts and crafts market featuring local artists. Live street performances and handmade goods.

title: Mahane Yehuda Market (Shuk) - Free Entry
description: Jerusalem's famous outdoor market. Free entry to explore food stalls, spices, and local culture. Nightlife on Thu/Fri evenings.

title: Old Jaffa Flea Market - Free Entry
description: Historic flea market in Old Jaffa. Free to browse antiques, vintage items, and local treasures.
